item0.name: Doran's Blade
item0.description:
8 Attack Damage
80 Health
  • Warmonger: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.

    Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

item1.name: Oblivion Orb
item1.description:
30 Ability Power
  • Cursed: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item2.name: Hextech Rocketbelt
item2.description:
90 Ability Power
350 Health
15 Ability Haste

Active - Hex Bolt: Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal (125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage. Then, gain 30% Move Speed towards enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

Supersonic's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item3.name: Control Ward
item3.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item5.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
item5.description:
18 Magic Penetration
45 Move Speed

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Summon Aery
perk0.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP) (+0.15 bonus AD).

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP) (+0.4 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

item1.name: Hextech Rocketbelt
item1.description:
90 Ability Power
350 Health
15 Ability Haste

Active - Hex Bolt: Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal (125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage. Then, gain 30% Move Speed towards enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

Supersonic's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item2.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
item2.description:
65 Ability Power
45 Armor
10 Ability Haste

Active - Stasis: You become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (120s cooldown).

item5.name: Void Staff
item5.description:
65 Ability Power
40% Magic Penetration

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

perk0.name: Unsealed Spellbook
perk0.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
perk0.longDesc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 25s (initial swap cooldown is at 5 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.

item2.name: Horizon Focus
item2.description:
115 Ability Power
  • Focus Fire: Damaging a champion with a non-targeted Ability at over 700 range or Immobilizing them Reveals them and increases their damage taken from you by 10% for 6 seconds.

    The Ability that triggers Focus Fire also benefits from the damage increase. Pets and non-immobilizing traps do not trigger this effect. Only the initial placement of zone Abilities will trigger this effect.

perk0.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
perk0.longDesc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 25s (initial swap cooldown is at 5 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.

item0.name: Verdant Barrier
item0.description:
25 Ability Power
25 Magic Resist
  • Adaptive: Killing a unit grants 0.5 Magic Resist (max 15).

item3.name: Hextech Rocketbelt
item3.description:
90 Ability Power
350 Health
15 Ability Haste

Active - Hex Bolt: Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal (125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage. Then, gain 30% Move Speed towards enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

Supersonic's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item4.name: Slightly Magical Footwear
item4.description:
25 Move Speed
  • Grants an additional 10 Move Speed. Boots that build from Slightly Magical Footwear retain this bonus Move Speed.

item5.name: Doran's Shield
item5.description:
80 Health
  • Focus: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.
  • Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.
  • Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.

    Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Unsealed Spellbook
perk0.shortDesc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
perk0.longDesc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 25s (initial swap cooldown is at 5 mins).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.

item0.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
item0.description:
18 Magic Penetration
45 Move Speed

item1.name: Void Staff
item1.description:
65 Ability Power
40% Magic Penetration

item2.name: Broken Stopwatch
item2.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item3.name: Hextech Rocketbelt
item3.description:
90 Ability Power
350 Health
15 Ability Haste

Active - Hex Bolt: Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal (125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage. Then, gain 30% Move Speed towards enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

Supersonic's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Summon Aery
perk0.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 40 based on level (+0.1 AP) (+0.15 bonus AD).

Empower or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 35 - 80 based on level (+0.25 AP) (+0.4 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

item0.name: Control Ward
item0.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item1.description: 40 Ability Power

item5.description:
65 Ability Power
40% Magic Penetration

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Refillable Potion
item0.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
